name: Hakurei Shrine
startIntroPart1: I am the shrine maiden of the Hakurei Shrine, Reimu Hakurei. Do you want some tea?
startIntroPart2: You happened to be the incarnation of the Hakurei God. Your shrine maiden, Reimu Hakurei, will serve you in your youkai-extermination from now on.
declaringWar: You're a youkai, aren't you? Prepare to be exterminated!
attacked: Hey, at least take off your shoes before you step on the shrine!
introduction: I am Reimu Hakurei, do you want some tea?
neutralHello: Do you want to help me clean the shrine?
uniques: [+55]% great person generation in all cities
